name: overridelinkedparam
description: Override parameters in your linked parameter files.
author: Kevin Hagenaars

inputs.name: parameterFile
inputs.label: Parameter file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The parameter file which has parameters that needs to be overridden.

inputs.name: parameters
inputs.label: Parameters to override
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type the template parameters to override in the textbox. Example, storageName:fabrikam. Make sure you add new parameters with a new line!
